change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Maverick: Shady Deal at Sunny Acres 1958
did.abstract: Mimeographed typescript for the Warner Brothers Television Division's "Maverick" T.V. series. The script contains several early revisions, with final approval on July 21, 1958, but later revisions on August 28, 1958.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Maverick: Shady Deal at Sunny Acres (MS 153). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Mimeographed typescript for the Warner Brothers Television Division's "Maverick" T.V. series. The script contains several early revisions, with final approval on July 21, 1958, but later revisions on August 28, 1958.
